    • Method Detail

      • login

        @PostMapping("/login")
public java.lang.String login​(@Valid
                              @Valid Admin admin,
                              org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                              org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Handles a site login request
        Parameters:
        admin - - pair of name and password.
        result - - applied validator and adds to model building.
        model - - thymeleaf model
        session - - session request to update attribute to true
        Returns:
        - thymeleaf html file of "login"(+ error message) in case of invalid name or password or redirect to "/"

public java.lang.String loginGet()

        Returns:
        - redirect to "/"

public java.lang.String logout​(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Handles a site logout request
        Parameters:
        session - - session request to update attribute to false
        Returns:
        - redirect to "/"
